title: Week 3 Matchups + Andy's Wild Night, Wheel of Shame - Fantasy Football Podcast for 9/24
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode to help you get a Win in Week 3! On today’s fantasy football podcast, lots of Week 3 matchup breakdowns and a special celebration for Andy! Plus, injury updates, a recap of the Panthers/Texans game, and the “Wheel of Shame” in the Fantasy Faceoff segment! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for September 24th, 2021.
  
 (06:45) - Thursday Night Recap
 (12:40) - FootClan Friday
 (13:30) - NFL News
 (24:30) - Fantasy Forecast 
 (25:05) - Falcons at Giants
 (30:25) - Bengals at Steelers
 (34:00) - Cardinals at Jaguars
 (41:15) - Jets at Broncos
 (43:50) - Dolphins at Raiders
 (47:05) - Buccaneers at Rams
 (51:20) - Seahawks at Vikings
 (53:25) - Packers at 49ers
 (59:30) - Eagles at Cowboys
 (01:03:30) - Fantasy Faceoff
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show

 Follow on Instagram
